DDS
Class ObjectScope

java.lang.Object
  DDS.ObjectScope

public final class ObjectScope
extends java.lang.Object

The ObjectScope class represents an enumeration of the possible scopes in which to view a DLRL object. I.E. Just the object itself (SIMPLE), or the object itself and it's composite relations or the object itself it's composite relations and it's non composite relations.

Field Summary
static int _CONTAINED_OBJECTS_SCOPE
          This option indicates that the concerned object should be viewed ignoring only non-composite relations.
static int _RELATED_OBJECTS_SCOPE
          This option indicates that the concerned object should be viewed taking all (composite) relations into account.
static int _SIMPLE_OBJECT_SCOPE
          This option indicates that the concerned object should be viewed ignoring any (composite) relations.
static ObjectScope CONTAINED_OBJECTS_SCOPE
          A convenience wrapper for the _CONTAINED_OBJECTS_SCOPE option of the ObjectScope enumeration.
static ObjectScope RELATED_OBJECTS_SCOPE
          A convenience wrapper for the _RELATED_OBJECTS_SCOPE option of the ObjectScope enumeration.
static ObjectScope SIMPLE_OBJECT_SCOPE
          A convenience wrapper for the _SIMPLE_OBJECT_SCOPE option of the ObjectScope enumeration.
 
Method Summary
static ObjectScope from_int(int value)
          Returns the correct ObjectScope object from the specified value or throws a runtime exception is the value is out of range.
 int value()
          This operation returns the value of this ObjectScope, which is either simple object scope, contained objects scope or related objects scope.

Field Detail

_SIMPLE_OBJECT_SCOPE

public static final int _SIMPLE_OBJECT_SCOPE
This option indicates that the concerned object should be viewed ignoring any (composite) relations. I.E. Only looking at the state of the object itself.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SIMPLE_OBJECT_SCOPE

public static final ObjectScope SIMPLE_OBJECT_SCOPE
A convenience wrapper for the _SIMPLE_OBJECT_SCOPE option of the ObjectScope enumeration.

_CONTAINED_OBJECTS_SCOPE

public static final int _CONTAINED_OBJECTS_SCOPE
This option indicates that the concerned object should be viewed ignoring only non-composite relations. I.E. The state of the object itself and the state of it's composite related objects is relevant.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CONTAINED_OBJECTS_SCOPE

public static final ObjectScope CONTAINED_OBJECTS_SCOPE
A convenience wrapper for the _CONTAINED_OBJECTS_SCOPE option of the ObjectScope enumeration.

_RELATED_OBJECTS_SCOPE

public static final int _RELATED_OBJECTS_SCOPE
This option indicates that the concerned object should be viewed taking all (composite) relations into account. I.E. The state of the object itself, the state of it's composite related objects and the state of it's non-composite related objects is relevant.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

RELATED_OBJECTS_SCOPE

public static final ObjectScope RELATED_OBJECTS_SCOPE
A convenience wrapper for the _RELATED_OBJECTS_SCOPE option of the ObjectScope enumeration.

Method Detail

value

public int value()
This operation returns the value of this ObjectScope, which is either simple object scope, contained objects scope or related objects scope.

Returns:
the value of this ObjectScope.

from_int

public static ObjectScope from_int(int value)
Returns the correct ObjectScope object from the specified value or throws a runtime exception is the value is out of range.

Parameters:
value - The value indicating the type of ObjectScope
Returns:
The correct ObjectScope matching the specified value
